Pankaj Chejara is a junior researcher cum web-developer at Center of Education Technology at Tallinn University, Estonia. His work is primarily focused on building AI tools to support teachers in classroom with group work monitoring.
He enjoys diving into data to extract insights and always ready to learn new things (if needed) to sovle problem at hand.
When not working on data analytics projects, Pankaj enjoys spending time with his son and watching animation movies.
